name: Maze - Final Submission
description:
Final submission for the JLM project.

It is highly recommended you play on full screen for the best experience.  

You may download an APK if you want to play on your phone.

Welcome to our Maze!

In this maze you have to find the golden graffiti spray to win.

In your arsenal is your trusted graffiti spray to mark walls, and you can teleport randomly around the maze.

Controls:

WASD or Joystick to move.

Finger/Mouse to change screen rotation.

Finger/Mouse/SpaceBar for jumping.

Mouse/E for teleporting.

Finger/Mouse/F for spraying graffiti.
